summary: Bill Williamson returns to bring down the president of the United States and his Secret Service detail.
cast: Brendan Fletcher|Bruce Blain|Loretta Walsh|Zain Meghji|Steve Baran|Ryan McDonell|Scott Patey|Yan-Kay Crystal Lowe|Anthony Rogers|Dan Shea|Brian Brisco|Matthew Sulzle|Brennan Walstrom|Tyson Arner|Shawn Stewart|Colby Chartrand|Raymond Sammel|John Sampson|Kye Walstrom|John Ulmer|Jovan Nenadic|Owen Walstrom|Adrian Persad|Trevor Jones|Deb Mac|Rick Pearce|Janina Dall|Mike Carpenter|Uwe Boll|Victor Formosa|Ralph Steiger
title: Rampage: President Down
